entry.summary:
WIP: Haskell Game Engine on Vulkan

A work in progress game engine.

Unique features:

  • Shader focused -- the engine is design with custom shaders in the center, and a lot of compile time validation and runtime data is based on the shader
  • Compile time validation of compatibility between the game defined materials and the game defined shader programs.
  • It's written in Haskell

The current demo is planets. To run it call:

cabal run planets

Write ups:

  • https://discourse.haskell.org/t/monthly-update-on-a-haskell-game-engine/5515
